examples.example: 妈妈用牛肉末做了道非常美味的菜肴，大家都很喜欢。

translate.english: Mother made a very delicious dish with minced beef, and everyone liked it very much.

examples.example: 我把牛肉末和蔬菜混合在一起，做成了营养丰富的肉丸。

translate.english: I mixed the minced beef with vegetables and made nutritious meatballs.

examples.example: 我今天尝试用牛肉末做了一道别样的美食，家人吃得很开心。

translate.english: I tried to make a special kind of delicacy with minced beef today, and the family ate very happily.
